metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28368 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Dompdf 1.2.1 allows remote code execution via a .php file in the src:url field of an @font-face Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) statement (within an HTML input file).

notes.Note: ccdm94> this vulnerability was introduced in version 0.8.0 by commit 0e0261b7.

criterions.comment: php-dompdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
